text: John Tavares (born September 20, 1990) is a Canadian professional ice hockey centre. He currently plays for the Toronto Maple Leafs of the National Hockey League (NHL). He is the current captain of the Maple Leafs. == Other websites == * * Category:1990 births Category:Canadian ice hockey centres Category:Olympic gold medalists for Canada Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Living people Category:New York Islanders players Category:Ontario Hockey League players Category:Toronto Maple Leafs players
title: John Tavares
